thread.title: NFL owner rescinds $10K opposition to nondiscrimination law
thread.title_full: NFL owner rescinds $10K opposition to nondiscrimination law

title: NFL owner rescinds $10K opposition to nondiscrimination law
text: NFL owner rescinds $10K opposition to nondiscrimination law Friday, 23 October 2015 (6 minutes ago) Houston Texans owner Bob McNair on Friday rescinded a $10,000 donation to conservatives hoping to repeal nondiscrimination protections for gay and transgendered residents in the city, saying the campaign made "unauthorized statements" about his beliefs. Houston Texans owner Bob McNair is rescinding a $10,000 donation to opponents of a city nondiscrimination ordinance protects gay rights because he says the...
